author: Joseph Young
title: Japanese Scientists Find New Coronavirus Transmission Route in Breakthrough Study
description: Scientists in Japan have found a third transmission route for coronavirus. Some are hopeful it could reduce the spread of the virus. The post Japanese Scientists Find New Coronavirus Transmission Route in Breakthrough Study appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Scientists in Japan discovered that micro particles could be causing coronavirus to spread much faster.
  • Simple conversations in close proximity could spread the virus without coughs and sneezes.
